# Event sourcing overview

> Documentation for Event sourcing overview.

- [Event sourcing configuration](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/grains/event-sourcing/event-sourcing-configuration.md): Learn about event sourcing configuration in .NET Orleans.
- [Immediate and delayed confirmation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/grains/event-sourcing/immediate-vs-delayed-confirmation.md): Learn the differences between immediate and delayed confirmation in .NET Orleans.
- [Event sourcing overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/grains/event-sourcing/index.md): Learn an overview of event sourcing in .NET Orleans.
- [The JournaledGrain API](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/grains/event-sourcing/journaledgrain-basics.md): Learn the concepts of the JournaledGrain API in .NET Orleans.
- [JournaledGrain diagnostics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/grains/event-sourcing/journaledgrain-diagnostics.md): Learn how to use JournaledGrain diagnostics in .NET Orleans.
- [Log-consistency providers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/grains/event-sourcing/log-consistency-providers.md): Learn about log-consistency providers in .NET Orleans.
- [Notifications](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/grains/event-sourcing/notifications.md): Learn the concepts of notifications in .NET Orleans.
- [Replicated grains](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/grains/event-sourcing/replicated-instances.md): Learn the concepts of replicated grains in .NET Orleans.
